channel.title: Heathkit HERO 1 ET-18, HERO 2000 ET-19, and HERO Jr. RT-1 Robots on HEROBOTS
channel.description: Recent content in Heathkit HERO 1 ET-18, HERO 2000 ET-19, and HERO Jr. RT-1 Robots on HEROBOTS

item.title: Website Update and HEROBOTS Gets a New Logo
item.description: This site is developed using a static generator called Hugo and the Hugo template called Book created by Alex Shpak. It’s taking me some time to understand how to both use Hugo and get my head around the various theme components, configuration and how to structure the website.

item.title: READY
item.description: This is the first post of the website, and to announce the launch of the website! When the HERO 1 first starts up, it makes a “READY” proclamation. So, instead of the typical “Hello World” or “Blinking LED”, we’re going to start with “READY.”
